round_best: Introduce a "Community-Aware PageRank" (CAP) algorithm that integrates community detection with traditional PageRank logic to better handle graphs with pronounced community structures. CAP would adjust the transition probabilities in the PageRank algorithm based on the community membership of nodes, possibly increasing the transition probabilities within the same community and reducing them between different communities. This adaptation would aim to balance the influence across communities, thereby preserving local context and maintaining overall diversity in the vertex ranking.
